title: Distributed Computing Platform
subtitle: Decentralized platform for micro-task execution
no_gstd_token: You don't have GSTD token. To participate in the system, you need to have GSTD token in your wallet.
task_created_desc: Your task has been successfully created and added to the queue
tonconnect_not_ready: TonConnect not ready. Please refresh the page.
gstd_required_desc: To participate in the system, you must have at least 1 GSTD token in your wallet. After purchase, your balance will refresh automatically within 30 seconds.
check_again: I have topped up / Check Now
platform_about_short: GSTD â€” the next generation decentralized mobile computing network. Secure, fast, efficient.
platform_desc_long: GSTD (Global Smart Task Distribution) is a platform connecting computing task customers with millions of mobile devices. We use idle smartphone power for AI inference, validation, and other micro-tasks, providing top-tier speed and data security via end-to-end encryption.
feature_latency: Tasks are executed within 5 seconds on average thanks to smart distribution.
feature_security: Data is encrypted with an AES-256 key. Even the server cannot read your data.
feature_economy: No limits. Holding GSTD reduces fees and increases your task priority.
step_cust_2: Fill in the parameters (type, model, budget in TON).
step_cust_3: Confirm the wallet transaction to lock funds (Escrow).
step_cust_4: Receive results as they are completed.
api_desc: Use our REST API to integrate with your systems. You can create thousands of tasks programmatically.
step_exec_1_desc: Launch the GSTD mobile app or use the SDK to integrate your device into the network.
step_exec_2_desc: The system will automatically assign tasks matching your NPU/CPU power.
step_exec_3_desc: Once the result is validated, you can withdraw TON directly to your wallet by confirming the transaction.
how_it_works_desc: GSTD Platform connects Workers with computational tasks in a decentralized network. Here's how Workers participate:
step_1_register_desc: Connect your device to the GSTD network. Your device becomes a Worker node that can process tasks.
step_2_execute_desc: Receive and execute computational tasks (AI inference, validation, etc.). Tasks are automatically assigned based on your device capabilities.
step_3_earn_desc: Get paid in TON for successfully completed tasks. Labor compensation is automatically distributed via smart contracts.
ai_verification_desc: Distribute AI model inference across a decentralized network. Perfect for content moderation, image classification, and NLP tasks.
govtech_desc: Government and public sector applications: document verification, citizen services automation, and transparent governance processes.
iot_desc: Process data from IoT devices at the edge. Real-time sensor data analysis, smart city applications, and distributed monitoring.
gstd_utility_desc: is a technical parameter that measures the certainty depth of computational results in the network.
what_is_gstd_desc: GSTD represents the guaranteed level of service quality and result validation. Higher GSTD means more validation layers and greater certainty in computational outputs.
how_gstd_works_desc: When you create a task, you specify a minimum GSTD requirement. The network ensures your task is validated by multiple Workers to meet this certainty depth. Higher GSTD requirements provide more reliable results but may take longer and cost more.
feature_quality_desc: GSTD (Guaranteed Service Time Depth) ensures result quality through multi-layer validation.
feature_neutrality: No geographic restrictions. Global network accessible from anywhere.
share_text: Join the GSTD Platform - Decentralized AI Inference Network
public_transparency: Real-time transparency of the GSTD Platform
no_tasks_desc: No tasks found. Create a new task to get started.
no_my_tasks_desc: You haven't created any tasks yet. Create your first task to get started.
no_available_tasks_desc: No tasks are currently available for execution.
no_nodes_desc: Register your first computing node to start earning GSTD by processing tasks.
